page.title: 19Air Activity In Our Area
page.content: In our area there is a great deal of air activity as there is the RAF armed forces camp in Halton.The most frequent craft is the helicopter followed by the motor-glider. Noel Edmonds,a well known television personality who lives in Weston Turville,has his own helicopter. There are many different types of helicopter that fly over such as Bells,Chinooks,Pumas,and Sikorsky. Also civil aircraft operate in the area. In Aston Clinton there is a restaurant,where helicopters can land, called "The Bell".People from all over the country come to this popular restaurant.
